name: Flexible Studies
summary: You've collected a cross-section of information on various disciplines you can refer to when preparing for various tasks.

name: Known Weaknesses
summary: Whenever you Devise a Stratagem, you can also attempt a check to Recall Knowledge as part of that action.

name: Takedown Expert
summary: You've mastered combat practices that let you get up close and bring down perpetrators alive.

name: That's Odd
summary: When you enter a new location, such as a room or corridor, you immediately notice one thing out of the ordinary.

name: Trap Finder
summary: You have an intuitive sense that alerts you to the presence of traps.

name: Undead Spotter
summary: Your studies of the undead have taught you tellale signs of a disguised undead creature.

name: Underworld Investigator
summary: Your work as an investigator makes you familiar with the criminal element.

name: Athletic Strategist
summary: You know how to calculatedly manipulate joints and body weight.

name: Red Herring
summary: You have a keen sense for avoiding spurious lines of inquiry.

name: Shared Stratagem
summary: The plans you make include your allies as well as yourself.

name: Solid Lead
summary: Sometimes your case splinters into smaller mysteries, but you never lose sight of the big picture.

name: Alchemical Discoveries
summary: You've devoted extra time in the lab to improve your knowledge of alchemy.

name: Detective's Readiness
summary: When you're on a case, you stay watchful and resolute to avoid tricks your suspect might pull.

name: Greenwatch Initiate
summary: You've received the basic training developed for all Greenwatch recruits.

name: Lie Detector
summary: You're adept at noticing the tells of a liar—sweat, flushing, a quavering voice, a quickening pulse.

name: Ongoing Investigation
summary: You're always investigating what's around you, even as you perform other activities.

name: Scalpel's Point
summary: Your stratagems benefit from your precise knowledge of anatomy.

name: Strategic Assessment
summary: You learn your foes' strengths and weaknesses by watching them move.

name: Strategic Repose
summary: You've trained extensively in fighting the undead.

name: Connect the Dots
summary: Ephemeral connections between people, places, and concepts are invisible to most, but seeing them is your stock and trade.

name: Defy Fey
summary: You are keen to the wiles of the fey and can usually shake off their magic.

name: Fey Tracker
summary: You are exceptionally skilled at noticing the subtle techniques fey use to avoid notice.

name: Predictive Purchase (Investigator)
summary: You have just the thing for the situation.

name: Read the Dust
summary: You watch the creature or hazard as it collapses, careful for any sign it may return.

name: Thorough Research
summary: When you succeed at a Recall Knowledge check, you learn an additional fact about the subject.

name: Blind-Fight
summary: Your battle instincts make you more aware of concealed and invisible opponents.

name: Clue Them All In
summary: You can clue in all your allies at once.

name: Greenwatch Veteran
summary: Your time spent tracking your target allows you to quickly identify its weaknesses and relay them to your allies.

name: Unseen Passage
summary: You have mastered a magical technique for moving through dangerous woodlands unseen.

name: Whodunnit?
summary: You carefully consider your case and narrow down some of the details.

name: Greenwatcher
summary: Your experience fighting against and alongside fey creatures is nearly unrivaled.

name: Just One More Thing
summary: After your attempt to influence someone goes poorly, you add another bit of information or ask a pointed question, possibly salvaging your previous attempt.

name: Ongoing Strategy
summary: You're constantly studying small aspects of everyone's movements, even if you don't have a stratagem in place ahead of time.

name: Suspect of Opportunity
summary: Sometimes something intrudes upon your case unexpectedly, such as an ambush sent to bring your investigation to a close.

name: Foresee Danger
summary: You perceive every possible way your foe's attack could land and attempt to avoid them all.

name: Reason Rapidly
summary: Your mind works through clues at an unbelievable speed.

name: Plot the Future
summary: You spend 10 minutes in contemplation to uncannily predict how events will play out.

name: Strategic Bypass
summary: Your plans account for your foes' resistances, enabling you to strike a telling blow.

name: Didactic Strike
summary: When you find a glaring weakness, you can set your allies up to annihilate your foe.

name: Implausible Purchase (Investigator)
summary: It seems impossible, but you've analyzed every angle and are able to just keep pulling out exactly the item you need, even in far-flung locations.

name: Lead Investigator
summary: You spend 1 minute briefing up to four allies about one lead you're pursuing.

name: Trickster's Ace
summary: You have a contingency in your back pocket for desperate situations.

name: All the Time in the World
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 75</row>
summary: Your firsthand experience of the subjective nature of time and space has given you new observational insights.

name: Everyone's a Suspect
summary: You are so suspicious of everyone you meet that you keep mental notes on how to defeat them all—even your own allies.

name: Just the Facts
summary: You fundamentally understand everything to the point where your research can't possibly be wrong.
